name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, specializing in **blockchain** technologies and proficient in Rust, Go, C++, and Solidity. Skilled in developing smart contracts and utilizing **EVM** frameworks, leveraging Foundry and Yul to create robust solutions.
Experienced in implementing CI/CD pipelines and managing observability to enhance system performance. Strong understanding of algorithms and data structures, coupled with expertise in cryptographic primitives and Merkle trees.
Additionally, adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, developing microservices, and employing event-driven architectures. Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. A proven track record of building AI/ML-powered platforms that incorporate predictive analytics and real-time processing while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
